Child care workforce shortages hurt the industry & parents‚Äô ability to return to work, w/ rippling effects on the economy. The State has millions in ARP child care assistance I secured for NH - it's past time to respond to this crisis and get funds out. 

https://t.co/Whuq1rhhzs
Our legislative efforts to support Ukraine must also continue ‚Äì the West must stand by our democratic partners just as they‚Äôve stood by us.

.@POTUS is making the right call. I‚Äôve long opposed NS2, which is why I wrote the bipartisan sanctions law to stop it. Every diplomatic lever must be pulled to punish Putin for violating Ukraine‚Äôs sovereignty & threatening Europe‚Äôs security. https://t.co/sUM3Lnvhbg

Heads up Granite Staters ‚Äì the hours of 11 state-run COVID-19 vaccination sites across NH are being modified. Check out these new hours below, and as always, get up-to-date on your COVID vaccines if you haven‚Äôt already. https://t.co/HtX6SP3c4c

The abortion ban passed & signed into law by NH Republicans is an attack on women & their access to essential health care. Another devastating side effect: fewer specialists plan to move to NH for fear of fines & imprisonment for their work. 

https://t.co/OkBsbwlHLL

This week marks #PublicSchoolsWeek! Quality public education provides the foundation for our kids to succeed & reach their full potential. Thank you to our public school teachers & staff who make schools the heart of our communities.

Congratulations to Ryan Peebles & wastewater facilities in Colebrook, Exeter & Milford for being recognized by the @EPA for their commitment to improving water quality. I‚Äôm excited to see $$ from the bipartisan infrastructure law continue NH‚Äôs excellence in wastewater treatment.

Free testing for HIV and hepatitis C will be available for Granite Staters in the Claremont area on Wednesday. 

The sooner you know your status, the better. No need to make an appointment or have insurance to get tested.  

https://t.co/JuNFTQR8fs

The bipartisan infrastructure law I helped negotiate was crafted to respond to the unique infrastructure needs of rural states like NH. @Sen_JoeManchin, @SenatorTester & I are urging the admin to ensure guidance for road & highway funding doesn‚Äôt leave behind rural communities. https://t.co/BKm81egmpp

NATO allies told Putin he would pay a hefty price for further invading Ukraine. I applaud Germany for halting the certification of Nord Stream 2, a geopolitical tool I‚Äôve long opposed b/c it would enable Putin to manipulate the energy supply & security of Europe. https://t.co/Chv5uz8tc0

@POTUS How the global community reacts to Putin‚Äôs violence carries implications for the future of other nations that Putin sees within reach, Europe‚Äôs security and U.S. national defense. What happens in Ukraine matters. It matters to Ukrainians, to Europe, to the U.S. and to the world.

Putin‚Äôs efforts to divide NATO have only strengthened the transatlantic alliance. Glad @POTUS is heeding my calls and others‚Äô to impose sanctions. Congress must explore new avenues to provide military assistance so Ukraine can defend itself.
As President Biden made clear last week, and as our allies have reaffirmed, Putin is trying to convince his own people of a lie that the world refuses to acknowledge. https://t.co/ofCT8liuiE

Putin‚Äôs illegal annexation of Donetsk & Luhansk must be met w/fierce condemnation from the global community & a response that reaffirms NATO, the West and democracies around the world will not sit by while Putin wages war on Ukraine. The admin should levy severe sanctions today.

Thank you, @USAmbPoland, for your leadership on behalf of the U.S. & in lockstep w/our Polish allies during this critical time for Ukraine, Poland & all our NATO ally frontline nations. Glad to be on the ground to meet our allies to address the security crisis. https://t.co/ptUSTjhq3s

There can be no daylight between the U.S. & our NATO allies on the cause for freedom & amid Putin‚Äôs increasing aggression. I‚Äôm glad to reaffirm that message in Poland today beside our allies. https://t.co/w52erde89v

Grateful for the service of @NHNationalGuard Pfc. Liam MacVittie for his brave actions to save a woman from her burning home in Stratford, shortly after finishing a shift at the Coos County Nursing Home. Thank you for your heroism!
https://t.co/q0L8bd6ARs woman-from-burning-home/

NH has some of the best museums in the country and now they‚Äôre more accessible to Granite State working families! Check out the 10 NH museums offering discounts on admission here:  

 https://t.co/sxe3aAodCs

These stories from survivors of human trafficking are devastating. Combating human trafficking has long been a priority of mine, & through my work on the Senate Appropriations Committee, I‚Äôll continue prioritizing $$ to support survivors & help them heal. https://t.co/UVOn0Qb8jg

I am¬†saddened by¬†the passing of former NH First Lady Dorothy Peterson. Dorothy‚Äôs kindness, compassion for her community¬†and strong work ethic¬†touched the lives of¬†many¬†across¬†NH. Sending my condolences to her family and loved ones.¬†¬†
https://t.co/T3iKpwJPBY

Black History Month is a time to honor how Black culture & communities have shaped American history, as well as recommit ourselves to rooting out racism. Proud to join this resolution celebrating Black History Month. https://t.co/BQIJeqGtTP

Millions of Americans live w/ diabetes ‚Äì they shouldn‚Äôt break the bank on life-saving insulin. As Co-Chair of the Senate Diabetes Caucus, I‚Äôm proud to help introduce a bill w/ @SenatorWarnock to cap the cost of insulin at $35 per month so more patients can lead healthy lives.

I joined @SenatorMenendez & @RepSpanberger on a bicameral letter urging the @IRSnews to take immediate action to reduce its massive backlog & improve customer service during the 2022 tax filing season. https://t.co/kOQjlTFMjM

Congrats to Sean Doherty ‚Äì a Conway native ‚Äì on his third Winter Olympic Games series. We are proud of your performance in the biathlon mixed relay, and I‚Äôm cheering on all of the #TeamUSA athletes competing this year üá∫üá∏. 

https://t.co/xKfFqXIncd

Thrilled @UofNH was selected as the lead institution to spearhead a groundbreaking $6M research project on biotechnology. Through my work on the approps committee, I help secure funding for @NSF to propel American excellence in science & technology. https://t.co/Mfbc6EdRP7

Glad to share that following my push, @USGSA has granted @CurrierMuseum a year-long extension for the display of the Guston & McKim murals. Granite Staters & visitors have another year to stop by & appreciate these beautiful pieces of art!

NH plays an important role in our global supply chain. For years, I‚Äôve secured resources to grow the Portsmouth Harbor, Pease International Tradeport & Portsmouth International Airport ‚Äì the infrastructure deal I negotiated opens even more opportunities for investment. https://t.co/dAwMGTESzw

The Senate voted overwhelmingly in favor of my bipartisan resolution w/ @senrobportman - the clearest message to date that we stand w/Ukraine. Should Putin further invade, he will make a gross miscalculation & face the full weight of a united Congress. https://t.co/dpSj7hwchR

Pleased Congress passed a short-term funding bill to avoid a shutdown, but we need a full-year spending bill ASAP.¬†¬†

This isn‚Äôt a partisan issue ‚Äì it's about keeping critical gov‚Äôt agencies that millions of people rely on up & running. Let's get it done.

Thanks @Wino üèà & Zeus üê∂ for stopping by @barnardschool in South Hampton yesterday. I appreciate his powerful message to students to explore their passions & pursue their dreams! 
https://t.co/2kqZPJ78Kh
Kudos to NH‚Äôs own Caroline Harvey on bringing home silver along with the Women‚Äôs @usahockey team at the Olympics ü•à. So proud of these incredible athletes #TeamUSA.

NEW: I introduced a bill to reauthorize $$ & strengthen the Northern Border Regional Commission. The NBRC supports rural businesses, job creation & local infrastructure in northern NH & across the rural Northeast. These projects are needed more than ever as we recover from COVID.

I echo @SecBlinken's powerful message today: Russia can end this path toward war. Putin can deescalate this crisis by drawing down troops, tanks and ships. Diplomacy is the way to resolve this threat. But the U.S. & our allies stand ready if he chooses to further invade Ukraine.

It is not a question of "if" but "how" we will respond to Putin, and there continues to be a bipartisan desire to do so. Our resolution reaffirms that commitment and is a direct message to both Ukraine and Russia about where the United States stands. 
https://t.co/KplMY70bHU

As the threat of a Russian invasion looms over Ukraine, we are united on the urgent need to provide military assistance so Ukraine can defend itself and closely align with our European allies to ready punitive measures if Putin steps one foot into Ukrainian territory.

As NH & the nation begin seeing a decline in omicron cases, please heed this warning from health care workers on the frontlines. We are not out of the woods yet. Get vaccinated & boosted to protect yourself & loved ones. 

https://t.co/32aIq1HAiq

The miniature boat that could ‚õµ! After a 462-day voyage, the Rye Riptides boat ‚Äì launched by Rye Jr. High School students ‚Äì struck land and was discovered by a sixth grader in Norway. 

https://t.co/S6gEJJjbhH
My full statement: https://t.co/YnsOddNDfJ

Glad the Senate finally confirmed DoD nominees, Dr. Wallander & Dr. Honey. I shouldn‚Äôt have to keep calling out GOP lawmakers for playing politics w/our national security, but if that‚Äôs what it takes to get these noms through to shore up the U.S.' defense, that‚Äôs what I‚Äôll do.

Today I chaired a @SFRCdems hearing to discuss how U.S. policy can best support peace & prosperity in the Western Balkans. We must continue to focus on the region‚Äôs movement toward European integration, as it has  critical national security implications for the U.S. https://t.co/qdyazjots2

Granite Staters of all ages make our communities stronger. Thank you to Riyah for her exceptional leadership, creating her own nonprofit to tutor refugee children in NH.  

https://t.co/cBTOOtDicn

Mental health & suicide prevention services are needed now more than ever, but unfortunately we don‚Äôt have enough mental health professionals in NH to meet demand. Addressing the mental health crisis & securing federal resources to help those in need must be a top priority. https://t.co/wfbMcrgQ9c

Pleased to hear commitments from DOD nominees today to address PFAS contamination that has impacted families across NH. We must deliver swift & meaningful solutions that mitigate the consequences of exposure for our military families, firefighters & surrounding communities. https://t.co/0YE5F5RGsG

.@usdafsa just issued a disaster declaration for Belknap, Chesire, Hillsborough, Merrimack, Rockingham, Stafford & Sullivan Counties following destruction from last season‚Äôs heavy rain. This decision allows assistance that will help NH farmers whose crop production suffered.
ATTN rural NH business owners & entrepreneurs ‚Äì check out this resource guide for helpful tips on how to grow your business & create good-paying jobs: https://t.co/IJvNxDOa5o

The bipartisan infrastructure law is a pivotal opportunity to deliver quality broadband to every U.S. household. We need accurate FCC maps to identify unserved & underserved areas - I‚Äôm joining a push to ensure $65B in broadband $$ I secured reaches communities that need it most. https://t.co/2aXtghJPLu

Congrats to Tristan Bowen of Riddle Brook School in Bedford on being recognized by @POTUS for her excellent work in STEM education. It‚Äôs Granite Staters like Tristan that are training the next generation of innovative leaders. 

https://t.co/4sTeK1JUKO

It‚Äôs troubling that in the ‚ÄòLive Free or Die‚Äô State we‚Äôre seeing dangerous efforts to control women‚Äôs repro rights.   

Decisions about women‚Äôs bodies should be made by women. I‚Äôll keep working to expand and protect access to reproductive care services. https://t.co/sOkiGWhWJL

I joined @senrobportman on the Senate floor to send a bipartisan message to Russia that Congress stands w/ Ukraine against Putin‚Äôs escalating, unprovoked belligerence. Putin won't divide this Senate, the U.S., nor the transatlantic alliance; if anything, he has further united us. https://t.co/U6l7TUtjQg

A reminder on Valentine‚Äôs Day that the current federal program propping up the sugar industry costs consumers & businesses as much as $4 billion per year. My bipartisan bill w/ @SenToomey would make commonsense reforms and end outdated restrictions that hurt American businesses.

I spoke w/ @WCVB to discuss the escalating crisis in Ukraine & the bipartisan determination in Congress to hold the Kremlin accountable for its aggression. The U.S. is united with our allies - there will be consequences for Putin‚Äôs belligerence against a sovereign nation. https://t.co/h2C5QWCzDy

NEW: I'm leading this letter w/ @SenatorBaldwin & @ChrisMurphyCT to limit junk health insurance plans, which can deny coverage for essential services & preexisting conditions. This is an important step to ensure every American has access to affordable, comprehensive health care. https://t.co/YKq8ZqQQLq

On this solemn anniversary of the Parkland shooting, I am holding the loved ones of those we lost too early in my thoughts. 

It‚Äôs past time Congress put an end to the scourge of gun violence. We must pass commonsense & meaningful reforms now to prevent another tragedy like this.

$2M is heading to @HarborHomesInc in Nashua to expand access to quality virtual health care. This funding from the #AmericanRescuePlan will make telehealth more affordable & reliable ‚Äì putting life-saving care within reach for more Granite Staters.

On Friday I met w/ trucking industry leaders in Concord for a firsthand look at their important work for our supply chain & economy. Great to see the next generation of local truckers being trained - I'll keep working to ensure this workforce grows & remains competitive. https://t.co/EtfbPJ3yUy

Devastated to see opioid overdose rates¬†in Manchester and Nashua¬†are the highest we‚Äôve seen in nearly 3 years.¬†Expanding¬†access to treatment, supporting affected families¬†&¬†addressing¬†the root causes of substance misuse¬†will continue to be my priority.¬†
https://t.co/iaWB1zLVep

COVID hit many Granite Staters‚Äô wallets hard, making everyday household expenses a challenge. I fought to secure flexible $$ through ARPA to help communities respond. With $579M still available in NH, getting these funds out the door will go a long way in supporting NH families. https://t.co/gsz9WdDNOP

Proud to join a bipartisan group of¬†Senators on this letter to @SecBlinken outlining priorities¬†to¬†advance¬†U.S. interests in the Arctic.¬†It‚Äôs time to¬†create a comprehensive Arctic strategy¬†&¬†elevate the¬†Arctic Coordinator position for further diplomacy. https://t.co/lWupaBwzzJ

Love seeing local artists collaborate to decorate the walls of the North Conway library with murals that highlight our state‚Äôs winter sports heritage. Be sure to stop by if you‚Äôre in the Mt. Washington Valley area!¬†
¬†
https://t.co/YB7EIAw9tw

This is important progress to restore $ for essential EE programs in NH. Glad the PUC is walking back some of the worst parts of its decision on NHSaves, but there‚Äôs more work ahead to get broadly supported efficiency efforts back on track for NH consumers & businesses. https://t.co/Qly3Hk5vmp

NH is in the middle of an affordable housing crisis. I visited @LRCDevelopers in Laconia today to discuss housing assistance I secured to help Granite Staters stay housed, & I'm committed to ensuring this relief reaches families who are still struggling. https://t.co/hqY3EKgbul

NEW: $10.7M is heading to NH to support wildlife conservation & restoration through @USFWS funding I helped secure. Protecting fish & wildlife is needed more than ever amid climate change - we must act now to preserve our environment for future generations.https://t.co/AjUyGuG7mh

Exciting news!: @HHSGov is awarding $75K for health care providers in NH to deliver essential health care to our rural communities. I fought to secure this relief for overwhelmed rural providers during ARP negotiations, & I‚Äôm glad to see this funding head out the door.

Granite Staters: help is now available to reduce internet bills by as much as $30 a month. 

Every family should have access to broadband - that‚Äôs why I helped create the Affordable Connectivity Program through the bipartisan infrastructure deal. 

https://t.co/LtKsbtb9EU

Seasonal workers are¬†the backbone of¬†NH¬†industries¬†like tourism and landscaping.¬†Proud to join this bipartisan effort to increase the number of authorized¬†H-2B¬†visas to support¬†a robust workforce¬†ahead of the busy¬†summer¬†season. https://t.co/A5KQa0kIDF

Today, the 106th annual Winter Carnival in Newport begins and runs through the weekend. Make sure to stop by for some winter fun ‚Äì from woodsman games and a parade to an Icelandic Stone lift competition.  

https://t.co/M67cQOSFWk

Heads up NH ‚Äì free medical-grade masks will soon arrive to pharmacies & health centers across NH. Each person can get up to three N95 masks, which provide better protection than cloth masks. https://t.co/RzTPfZskvq

Great news for @UofNH! Thrilled that @NASA selected HelioSwarm ‚Äì led by UNH‚Äôs Harlan Spence ‚Äì as one of two missions to research the Sun, the Earth & our universe. Can't wait to see what discoveries emerge from this groundbreaking $250M mission. https://t.co/xvjewlZ53W

As #RoevWade hangs in the balance, NH Republicans are doubling down on their dangerous crusade to roll back repro rights. Now more than ever, we need federal protections to preserve women's access to health & combat these extreme anti-women state agendas. 
https://t.co/JsVRFjKCF7

I applaud the important discussions on media freedom that are underway in Estonia. The Global Conference for Media Freedom brings together a coalition of 50 countries working together to improve protections for journalists and strengthen global efforts that defend media freedom. https://t.co/5N71VJMxEH

Amid threats from Russia & China, we need U.S. personnel around the world advancing our security. Today I pushed the Senate to confirm qualified DOD nominees, but political grandstanding blocked them. Obstruction from some Senate GOP is playing into the hands of our adversaries. https://t.co/9SqZnFjYsz

Congress is delivering bipartisan legislation to @POTUS‚Äô desk to help survivors of sexual harassment & assault seek justice, but we are also sending an unmistakable message on workplace reform: survivors will not be silenced & perpetrators will be held accountable. https://t.co/p0denLnqdT

Wishing members of the Navy JROTC marksmanship team from West High School the best of luck at the national championship this week!   
https://t.co/X8J9aluDD5

For decades @USPS has helped people stay connected, receive medications, vote & more. But these vital operations are under severe strain, especially amid COVID. Glad the House passed essential bipartisan legislation to modernize & strengthen USPS - now it‚Äôs the Senate‚Äôs turn. https://t.co/VNlzTcWBfP

Glad Congress finally reached a full-year spending framework. I'll work to see this bill swiftly pass w/ priorities I fought to secure as Chair of the CJS subcommittee, including record-level VAWA funding, support for first responders & $$ for substance use disorder programs. https://t.co/1Uc0pr7ECE

On this Day of Solidarity, I #StandWithBelarus & echo calls for free, independent media. 

The incarceration of over 1K political prisoners ‚Äì including 33 journalists ‚Äì is unconscionable. All political prisoners must be freed in the fight for democracy & human rights. https://t.co/m57Q7dOD62

Congress has repeatedly failed to fund the gov't on time, compromising our national security & critical agency functions that keep our country running. Glad we finally have a path on a full-year spending bill, but Congress must stop running from 1 manufactured crisis to the next. https://t.co/OA9h3LCseO

Obstruction in Congress has delayed #VAWA  reauthorization for 3 years ‚Äì the flagship bipartisan law that supports survivors of sexual & domestic violence. 

It‚Äôs past time we right that wrong. I‚Äôm proud to help lead the reintro of the VAWA Act of 2022 in the Senate. https://t.co/QG5MlVqWcl

Global violence & persecution targeting LGBTQI communities are reprehensible. Today, the House passed legislation that I lead in the Senate to hold individuals accountable for these clear human rights violations. The House did its job, now it‚Äôs time for the Senate to follow suit. https://t.co/PDazl93nPs
Granite Staters can find essential resources like free masks at community health centers & pharmacies at  https://t.co/I37SiYXxzg  & order free at-home COVID-19 tests at https://t.co/3QSnGuvS0O.

No one should have to choose between paying the bills & affording essentials like masks & testing to keep their families safe during COVID. I‚Äôll continue fighting in Congress to ensure working families in NH & across the nation don‚Äôt fall through the cracks. https://t.co/0S6d4pQkB8

We know climate change poses serious threats to our national security & military readiness. I'm pleased @USArmy is taking important action to address the existential dangers of the climate crisis by releasing its first-ever climate strategy.  
https://t.co/DdlyqPhB9u

Deploying U.S. troops to reinforce our NATO allies strengthens our united defense against Putin‚Äôs aggression. 

My exchange w/ @CENTCOM Commander Nominee LTG Kurilla on how to ensure this deployment is successful & how to expose Putin‚Äôs malign intentions. https://t.co/XGAQZrZG4u

I'm proud to lead a bipartisan bill w/ @SenatorCollins to delay PRF reporting requirements & open up relief to improve workforce safety. We need all hands on deck to get through this pandemic - we'll deal with the bureaucracy later.

Health care workers are under immense stress. The Provider Relief Fund has been a lifeline for them during COVID to meet the demand & expand services, but complex reporting rules are getting in the way of their ability to focus on delivering lifesaving treatment.

NH's seasonal businesses rely on the H-2B visa program to keep doors open. As we recover from COVID, ensuring the H-2B visa process operates efficiently is crucial for their recovery. Appreciated the nominee for Amb. to Jamaica Nickolas Perry‚Äôs commitment to make that a priority. https://t.co/wdTGmg8g9Q

Combating the substance use disorder crisis & supporting affected families has long been a top priority of mine. Pleased to see funding from COSSAP ‚Äì which I established ‚Äì expand Laconia‚Äôs SUD initiative & statewide efforts to address substance misuse.https://t.co/CkqYEJs1eE

Glad to join @SenatorCarper & this bipartisan group of Senators on behalf of our manufacturers fighting to recover from the pandemic & who are unfairly burdened by Trump-era tariffs. https://t.co/B9DLN6HuhL

Women like Michelle & Karen are the heart of NH‚Äôs resilience. Thanks to their leadership & compassion, services like mental health counseling and addiction rehabilitation are within reach for more Granite State communities.  

https://t.co/ZebmzRBegV

Appreciated meeting w/ German Chancellor @OlafScholz last night. The U.S. & Germany are united in response to Russian belligerence against Ukraine. Putin will face consequences from NATO & the transatlantic alliance if he further escalates aggression against Ukraine.

With snowstorms & more cold weather ahead, many Granite Staters are struggling to afford high heating prices. I‚Äôve fought to bolster LIHEAP assistance & weatherization programs that help keep costs down ‚Äì check out these resources to see if you‚Äôre eligible:https://t.co/BBUOG9Cjsw
This is a manufactured crisis that needs to be swiftly cleaned up before more NH working families are unfairly punished.  https://t.co/i3KCVjLsl1

The PUC threw a giant wrench into NH‚Äôs energy efficiency programs, hurting families like the Chisholms. I fought for record federal funding for fuel assistance and weatherization, but we need NHSaves fully back to keep workers on the job and homes safe and warm this winter.

Wonderful to see Granite Staters of all ages enjoy the snow this weekend at Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park. 

Saint-Gaudens is a NH treasure and is one of many outdoor spaces that‚Äôs helped NH families have fun & stay safe amid the pandemic.‚ùÑÔ∏è
https://t.co/2XTpSJkrf6

.@POTUS sent a strong message after meeting w/ German Chancellor @OlafScholz that the transatlantic alliance is determined to hold Putin to account & to stand by Ukraine. Within the U.S. & among our allies, we are united: Ukraine and only Ukraine will determine its future. https://t.co/U7ZCI9kk3W

As we expand 5G networks, unintended consequences must be considered, like interference with aircraft instruments critical to air safety. @SenatorHassan & I sent a letter urging transparency from FAA & coordination with MHT to ensure flight operations aren‚Äôt affected. https://t.co/Ns18U4lKeE

Proud to join @MarkWarner & @SenRickScott on this resolution condemning China for the silencing of tennis star Peng Shuai. There must be consequences from the international community for repeated human rights abuses by the Chinese gov‚Äôt. https://t.co/CWC61XoBS9

Pregnant women should be able to work free from discrimination. I‚Äôm proud to support bipartisan legislation to require employers to provide simple workplace accommodations to expectant workers. It's past time to make workplaces more supportive of mothers.  https://t.co/OPBJks6yz0

This week, the Senate unanimously passed my bipartisan resolution supporting democracy in Belarus & condemning Lukashenka‚Äôs transnational repression. I‚Äôm pleased @StateDept is putting Lukashenka on alert that there will be consequences for violence against political dissidents. https://t.co/6n50DBRLXA

The House took important action to invest in U.S. competitiveness against China & prepare our workforce to lead with innovation. 

Pleased my bill was included as part of the COMPETES Act, to expand opportunities for STEM education & build a diverse generation of leaders. https://t.co/S2WRpepEu4

This strong jobs report builds on the greatest 12 months of job creation in nearly 40 years. I‚Äôll continue working with the Biden admin to make sure our robust economic recovery includes workers who were hit hardest by the pandemic. 

https://t.co/pBXJXT7Lfp

On what would have been her 109th birthday, we celebrate the legacy of #RosaParks - the mother of the civil rights movement. She was a courageous, visionary leader who propelled our nation towards equality & justice. Happy birthday to this civil rights legend! https://t.co/dUGfYF85kF

Stay safe out there Granite Staters ‚ùÑÔ∏è

Big thanks to our reporters keeping us up-to-date in these harsh conditions! https://t.co/mMxAvDBCRG

Honored to participate in the Change of Command ceremony at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard today to recognize Captain Ettlich for his service and to welcome Captain Oberdorf. Captain Ettlich: I wish you fair winds & following seas. Captain Oberdorf: welcome aboard.‚öì https://t.co/qaAMt9zTeK

Red Cross has declared a blood crisis for the first time in its history, delaying critical surgeries for patients across the country. If you‚Äôre able, please consider donating blood. Every donation makes a difference ‚Äì especially as we battle the pandemic.
https://t.co/BtwpaAJESR

The Aviation Museum of NH is highlighting the stories & voices of Black soldiers stationed at Grenier during WWII. The contributions of Black Americans have been overlooked for too long in U.S. history ‚Äì check out this presentation on 2/10 for more info. 

https://t.co/i5IH6d0ZCd

Granite Staters!: Medicare & Medicaid recipients will soon be able to receive to up to 8 free rapid COVID-19 tests a month at the pharmacy. Testing is key to mitigating the spread & ending this crisis. Available now online, order 4 free tests a month at https://t.co/cj36DGLVHR. https://t.co/XtVqmh8XNn

Minority-owned businesses have always faced unique challenges, which the economic fallout from COVID has only exacerbated. I‚Äôm glad to see @ManchesterNAACP & @NHCommLoanFund coming together to support & empower business owners of color in Manchester. https://t.co/1xfDJ9cs9X

.@SenatorWicker & I sat down with @TheWilsonCenter‚Äôs @AmbassadorGreen today to reaffirm bipartisan support for Ukraine amid increasing threats from Russia & the ongoing work in Congress to respond to this crisis. https://t.co/teyle5TiLw

During COVID, teachers have adapted to difficult virtual settings & supported students through a mental health epidemic ‚Äì they need better support for their essential work. More must be done to address teacher burnout & severe school shortages. 

https://t.co/z0m3oZFOhF

We know terrorism in one part of the world does not stay there. @POTUS seized a critical opportunity to advance our counterterrorism efforts to wipe out ISIS & safeguard U.S. national security. TY to our brave U.S. forces who put their lives on the line to complete this mission. https://t.co/CIKOz5WeHP

Looking forward to talking with @SenatorWicker & @AmbassadorGreen about the military & political crisis in Ukraine. Tune in today at 12:30 PM to hear the U.S.‚Äô robust response to Russian aggression to protect the stability of Eastern Europe & our national security. https://t.co/aRzXrTc5v7

152 years ago, the 15th Amendment was ratified, enshrining the right to vote for African American men in the Constitution. 

Today, we must do everything to continue expanding access to the ballot box ‚Äì including fighting shameful voter suppression we see across the country.

Glad to join @senrobportman for an important discussion with @CSIS yesterday & to send a powerful, bipartisan message in support of our Ukrainian partners as they face increased provocations & aggression from a belligerent Putin. https://t.co/Y7MHgO9Ylg

I met w/ General Berger, Commandant of the Marine Corps, this morning to discuss his priorities for @USMC to prepare our nation for the threats of today & tomorrow. Ensuring our Marines have the equipment & capacity needed to safeguard our national security is a top priority.

Today I heard from the @HelsinkiComm on the latest developments surrounding the crisis in Ukraine orchestrated by Russia. The U.S. is working in lockstep w/ our allies to hold Putin accountable for threatening Ukraine‚Äôs sovereignty & regional stability. https://t.co/HgXUvCkS2g

There is a bipartisan commitment in Congress to bolster Ukraine‚Äôs military capabilities & prioritize diplomacy to force Putin to recalculate.

The U.S. & our allies stand firm that Putin will face consequences for escalating further aggression against Ukraine. https://t.co/7KWN6ESwcj
